segments.text: Hello , Friendship Restaurant . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to book a table tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Sir . For how many people , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Eight o'clock tonight , would you please set us in a private room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So sorry , we're fully booked in that room . Would you like to make reservation some other time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe not , thank you all the same then .
segments.speaker: S2
